snippet: If the protesters have not left by Aug. 27, the next step will be for a court bailiff to decide what, if any, action to take.
abstract: Hong Kong judge gives a dwindling band of Occupy Hong Kong protesters until August 27 to vacate the space below HSBC's Asian headquarters; if the protesters do not leave, the next step will be for a court bailiff to decide what, if any, action to take.
lead_paragraph: If the protesters have not left by Aug. 27, the next step will be for a court bailiff to decide what, if any, action to take.

headline.seo: Judge Orders Occupy Hong Kong Protesters to Leave
headline.main: Protesters In Hong Kong Ordered Out Of HSBC Site
headline.print_headline: Protesters In Hong Kong Ordered Out Of HSBC Site
